questions.text: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you want to smoke a cigarette, little cigar, cigarillo, or large cigar right now.
questions.smsText: On a scale of 1 (not at all) to 10 (extremely), rate how strongly you want to smoke a cigarette, little cigar, cigarillo, or large cigar right now. (1=Not at all 10=Extremely)

questions.text: What would you prefer to smoke right now?
questions.smsText: What would you prefer to smoke right now? (1=Cigarette,2=Little cigar,3=Cigarillo,4=Cigarillo,5=No preference,6=I don’t want to smoke right now)

choices.text: I don’t want to smoke right now
